title: Life is about making an impact, not making an income. –Kevin Kruse
head: Inspirational

title: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve. –Napoleon Hill
head: Inspirational

title: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value. –Albert Einstein
head: Inspirational

title: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.  –Robert Frost
head: Inspirational

title: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse. –Florence Nightingale
head: Inspirational

title: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. –Amelia Earhart
head: Inspirational

title: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run. –Babe Ruth
head: Inspirational

title: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement. –W. Clement Stone
head: Inspirational

title: Life isn’t about getting and having, it’s about giving and being. –Kevin Kruse
head: Inspirational

title: Life is what happens to you while you’re busy making other plans. –John Lennon
head: Inspirational

title: We become what we think about. –Earl Nightingale
head: Inspirational

title: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do, so throw off the bowlines, sail away from safe harbor, catch the trade winds in your sails.  Explore, Dream, Discover. –Mark Twain
head: Inspirational

title: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it. –Charles Swindoll
head: Inspirational

title: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any. –Alice Walker
head: Inspirational

title: The mind is everything. What you think you become.  –Buddha
head: Inspirational

title: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now. –Chinese Proverb
head: Inspirational

title: An unexamined life is not worth living. –Socrates
head: Inspirational

title: Eighty percent of success is showing up. –Woody Allen
head: Inspirational

title: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life. –Steve Jobs
head: Inspirational

title: Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is. –Vince Lombardi
head: Inspirational

title: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions. –Stephen Covey
head: Inspirational

title: Every child is an artist.  The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up. –Pablo Picasso
head: Inspirational

title: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore. –Christopher Columbus
head: Inspirational

title: Either you run the day, or the day runs you. –Jim Rohn
head: Inspirational

title: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right. –Henry Ford
head: Inspirational

title: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why. –Mark Twain
head: Inspirational

title: Whatever you can do, or dream you can, begin it.  Boldness has genius, power and magic in it. –Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
head: Inspirational

title: The best revenge is massive success. –Frank Sinatra
head: Inspirational

title: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing.  That’s why we recommend it daily. –Zig Ziglar
head: Inspirational

title: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage. –Anais Nin
head: Inspirational

title: If you hear a voice within you say “you cannot paint,” then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced. –Vincent Van Gogh
head: Inspirational

title: There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing. –Aristotle
head: Inspirational

title: Ask and it will be given to you; search, and you will find; knock and the door will be opened for you. –Jesus
head: Inspirational

title: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be. –Ralph Waldo Emerson
head: Inspirational

title: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams.  Live the life you have imagined. –Henry David Thoreau
head: Inspirational

title: When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left and could say, I used everything you gave me. –Erma Bombeck
head: Inspirational

title: Few things can help an individual more than to place responsibility on him, and to let him know that you trust him.  –Booker T. Washington
head: Inspirational

title: Certain things catch your eye, but pursue only those that capture the heart. – Ancient Indian Proverb
head: Inspirational

title: Believe you can and you’re halfway there. –Theodore Roosevelt
head: Inspirational

title: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear. –George Addair
head: Inspirational

title: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light. –Plato
head: Inspirational

title: Teach thy tongue to say, “I do not know,” and thous shalt progress. –Maimonides
head: Inspirational

title: Start where you are. Use what you have.  Do what you can. –Arthur Ashe
head: Inspirational

title: Fall seven times and stand up eight. –Japanese Proverb
head: Inspirational

title: When one door of happiness closes, another opens, but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one that has been opened for us. –Helen Keller
head: Inspirational

title: Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see. –Confucius
head: Inspirational

title: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world. –Anne Frank
head: Inspirational

title: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be. –Lao Tzu
head: Inspirational

title: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away. –Maya Angelou
head: Inspirational

title: Happiness is not something readymade.  It comes from your own actions. –Dalai Lama
head: Inspirational
